description:
Sip on the go without worrying about spilling your beverage.

  • Flip up nozzle is leak-resistant when closed
  • Works with Yeti Rambler bottles
  • Straw can be cut to length to fit your bottle
  • Dishwasher safe and BPA free
  • Not intended for carbonated, perishable, pulpy or hot beverages
name: Yeti Replacement Rambler Bottle Cap Straws
